document.name: WhatToHongKong

sentence.text: They seemed part of his dream , as unreal as the terrifying boxes .
His smile , as I recounted my terrifying encounter -- I am an arachnophobe -- implied that there were worse things in life than having a spider wandering over one 's hair .
The bride , in a white wedding gown , and the groom , in a tuxedo , clung tightly to each other as they took the terrifying plunge .

And that was when he grinned and offered one more piece of terrifying information
Six months or so of this produced not only a degree of understandable tedium -even the most terrifying things can become boring if lived with long enough -- but what I would call an inverse effect .
In the most terrifying story in all Scripture God decides to begin again with a single family , this time with one whose head , Noah , has shown some signs of righteousness .
Furthermore , the Second World War had resulted in the most terrifying weapon of destruction being not only developed but also deployed against the enemy .

She did not propose to gratify Gloria 's curiosity any further ; the memory of her meeting with Ernest was too precious to talk about -- the most terrifying moment of her life , and the most wonderful .
When you walked along it , it swung from side to side in a most terrifying fashion .
` They never seem to get the people who commit the most terrifying crimes .
Once upon a time he had read a quite terrifying number of books and accumulated an equally terrifying number of opinions about them .
Refused admission by the front door , he had forced his way through the back -- ; and with quite terrifying violence .

I 've carried weights , swung on beams and parallel bars , jumped ditches , scrambled over walls , scaled rather terrifying cliffs by rope , and generally behaved in the fashion of an anthropoid ape .
He had a magic touch on the string that jerked its engine into rather terrifying life .
It was a ludicrous but terrifying sight .
O'Hara , he said , was the terrifying shadow on the wall which every child saw through half-closed lids once the nursery door had shut .
There was a terrifying rumbling noise and the stairs shook as though a minor earthquake had passed beneath the house .

Those trapped in the crush at Hillsborough who were fortunate enough to escape without injury have no claim in respect of the distress they suffered in what must have been a truly terrifying experience .
` It was a pretty terrifying situation , " he admitted .
Chloe Joe has obviously had some terrifying experiences , and she certainly needs to be ` de-sensitised " to every sort of household noise , family and friends .
Nellie looked very serious as she listened to her battered husband reliving his terrifying experience .
Police say she 's now recoevring from her terrifying experience .
The pair were quizzed over the abduction of a woman who underwent a terrifying 15-hour ordeal after calling a cab to collect her from a pub .
Their trip to Disney World in Florida was cut short after a terrifying ordeal when they were faced with a gang , brandishing a sawn-off shotgun .
A JURY sat spellbound yesterday as they heard the ` chilling " account of estate agent Stephanie Slater 's terrifying eight-day kidnap ordeal at the hands of alleged killer Michael Sams .
Four masked men subjected two staff at a snooker club in waterloo Street , Newcastle , to a terrifying ordeal yesterday before escaping with several hundred pounds .
And every new wave of redundancies brings the terrifying prospect closer .
If she misbehaved , she was packed off to sleep in the old people 's home in another part of the building -- a terrifying prospect for a girl with such a vivid imagination .
The life of this Government still has four and a half years to run , a terrifying prospect for us all .
For a man like Simon Peter , this , of course , constitutes a terrifying prospect .
Shirley 's cheeks had turned pale at the thought of facing the terrifying tramp .

We have contracted a native dentist to design the super de luxe version with terrifying teeth , enough to clear the river of all nasty wildlife , and hope these will be ready for the next paddling season .

At the bottom of the steps Ingmar Bresslaw was waiting in terrifying silence .
Although only twenty eight tanks -- just over half the original number -- remained , the amassed Chelonian assault force made a terrifying spectacle .
For one terrifying moment she thought he was going to subdue her again but she threw him off with a shove .
The second terrifying thing about the Eighties is that it 's the age of the professional .
THREE detectives received commendations for ` first class police work " in finding the men involved in a terrifying pub robbery .
And Hangar Straight , where cars reach a terrifying l95 miles an hour , is a permanent reminder of the circuit 's former role as a military airfield .
THE terrifying Jurassic Park dinosaurs were much noisier in the film than they would have been in real life , a scientist said today .
The more daring can try out the terrifying roller-coaster rides .
